title: President makes surprise visit to Sri Lanka Sustainable Energy Authority
content: President Gotabaya Rajapaksa on Friday (18) made a surprise inspection at the Sri Lanka Sustainable Energy Authority, located in Colombo 7 The objective of the Presidentâ€™s visit was to directly engage with the officials from the Sri Lanka Sustainable Energy Authority on the possibility of further using Hydro, Wind, and Solar energy for electricity generation.In addition, the President had used the visit to inquire into the delay in granting approvals to pending renewable energy projects.
